typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FacilityUUID as short,
		FacilityLegacyID as short,
		PostalCodeLegacyID as integer,
		PostalCodeUUID as integer,
		FacilityPlantIdentifier as string,
		FacilityNameEnglish as string,
		FacilityNameFrench as string,
		FacilityRoutingTagNameEnglish as string,
		FacilityAbbreviatedNameEnglish as string,
		FacilityAbbreviatedNameFrench as string,
		FacilityTypeAbbreviationEnglish as string,
		FacilityTypeAbbreviationFrench as string,
		PostalAddressUUID as short,
		ServedPlaceLegacyID as date,
		FacilityQualifierNameEnglish as string,
		FacilityQualifierNameFrench as string,
		DepotCodeName as string,
		ProcessingFacilityLegacyID as integer,
		FacilityCostCentre as string,
		LastModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FacilityCURVW
source(output(
		RouteUUID as short,
		FacilityUUID as short,
		RouteTypeEnglish as string,
		RouteTypeFrench as string,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RouteCURVW
source(output(
		Route_UUID as string,
		RouteDisplayName as string,
		FacilityUUID as string,
		RestructureScheduleImplementationDate as string,
		RestructureScheduleValidationDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RoutePND
FacilityCURVW, RouteCURVW lookup(FacilityCURVW@FacilityUUID == RoutePND@FacilityUUID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpFacilityRouteCURVW
LkpFacilityRouteCURVW lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpFacilityRoutePND
